mapper.sql: id, uid, uname, rid, time, cname, id_deleted, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into live_user_kicked(uid, uname, rid, time, cname) values (#{uid}, #{uname}, #{rid}, #{time}, #{cname})
mapper.select: select from live_user_kicked where is_deleted = 0 and cname = #{cname} order by create_time desc
select from live_user_kicked where is_deleted = 0 and id = #{id}
